name: @sumor/logger
description: This is a lightweight logger for Node.JS. It can output logs in different levels, and you can customize the scope, id, and timezone.
author: Sumor Cloud Ltd

scripts.publish-beta: npm version prerelease --preid beta && npm run push-tag
scripts.publish-release-patch: npm version patch && npm run push-tag
scripts.publish-release-minor: npm version minor && npm run push-tag
scripts.publish-release-major: npm version major && npm run push-tag
scripts.check: eslint --fix . && prettier --write . && npm audit fix --force && npm run coverage
